content.901756/f Abigail 2500/t 1700 2400/o Abig: Upper_Ambient/18 7/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Abigail 18 11 0/skippable/move Abigail 0 -3 1/move Abigail 5 0 2/pause 500/animate Abigail false false 150 26 24 25 25 25 25/pause 450/playSound sandyStep/stopAnimation Abigail/showFrame Abigail 25/pause 2000/playSound batFlap/pause 500/playSound batFlap/pause 500/playSound batFlap/pause 500/emote Abigail 8/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite abbyOneBat/playSound batScreech/showFrame Abigail 32/shake Abigail 2000/pause 2000/showFrame Abigail 0/pause 600/animate Abigail false true 100 28 29/pause 1200/stopAnimation Abigail/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite abbyManyBats/showFrame Abigail 32/shake Abigail 2000/pause 2000/speed Abigail 8/move Abigail 0 -4 0/speed Abigail 8/move Abigail 2 0 0/animate Abigail false false 100 21 20 20/pause 200/showFrame Abigail 20/shake Abigail 10000/pause 2000/warp farmer 18 13/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 8/move farmer 6 0 0/speed farmer 8/playMusic desolate/move farmer 0 -4 1/speak Abigail "$q 776589 無#*吸氣*$s#$r 776589 20 Event_Cave2_1#發生了什麼事？#$r 776589 40 Event_Cave2_2#你還好嗎？"/pause 500/animate Abigail false false 100 21 0 0/pause 200/stopAnimation Abigail/faceDirection Abigail 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "你也知道我練了一段時間的劍法……$9#$b#所以我覺得今天是進山洞探險的好日子……$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1000/speak Abigail "……但我嚇壞了。我做不到。$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/speak Abigail "$q 34 null#我可能沒有自己想像的那麼勇敢……$8#$r 34 20 Event_Cave_1#和我在一起，你就安全了。#$r 34 40 Event_Cave_2#我也害怕。#$r 34 -50 Event_Cave_3#你哭得就像個三歲小孩。別說了。"/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/pause 1500/playMusic sadpiano/pause 1800/speak Abigail "@我……我真的喜歡你……不只是朋友間的那種喜歡。你懂我的意思嗎？$l"/pause 1000/speak Abigail "不敢相信，我居然會這麼說……但我憋不住了。這種想法我已經在心裡藏了好久。$l"/pause 1800/speak Abigail "你現在什麼都不用說。就讓我們在這裡待一會吧……$l^我從沒對其他女孩有過這種感覺……直到我遇見了你。"/playMusic Upper_Ambient/pause 1000/showFrame Abigail 33/showFrame 101/pause 2500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.100162/t 600 2600: MarlonsTheme/21 9/farmer -100 -100 0 Marlon 23 6 2/addQuest 14/skippable/pause 1000/move Marlon 0 2 2/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 4/pause 1000/speak Marlon "唔…… "/pause 500/warp farmer 18 13/playSound stoneStep/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 500/speak Marlon "我只想看看這座古老的礦井。#$b#它已經荒廢幾十年了。"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 4/speak Marlon "下面可能還有些不錯的礦石。#$b#但這麼一個黑漆漆的地方，已經好久都沒人下去過了……恐怕你能在那裡找到的不僅是礦石而已……"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 500/speak Marlon "給，拿著這個。你興許用得上。"/pause 500/playSound dwop/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/itemAboveHead sword/pause 3300/awardFestivalPrize sword/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Marlon "順便告訴你，我叫馬龍。我就在外面經營著探險家公會。#$b#我會關注著你的一舉一動。如果你能證明自己，我可能會讓你成為會員。"/pause 500/end
